context: Label for subject orientation concept scheme http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/r
text: subject orientation concept scheme

context: Definition for subject orientation concept scheme http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/r
text: a SKOS concept scheme for orientation
unspecified orientation
orientation is not known because it is not specified
anterior side
view of the side towards the head or forward end of the organism
posterior side
view of the side away from the head or towards the rear end of the organism
lateral side
view of the side perpendicular to the main axis of the organism
right side
view of the right side of a whole bilaterally symmetric organism
left side
view of the left side of a whole bilaterally symmetric organism
dorsal side
view of the side dorsal to the frontal plane of a bilaterally symmetric organism
ventral side
view of the side ventral to the frontal plane of a bilaterally symmetric organism
upper side
view of the side of the part oriented toward the central axis of a plant (adaxial)
In plants, use this term rather than "dorsal". For types of plants or fungi having horizontal parts and lacking a clear central axis, this is the surface away from the ground.
BSPO has adaxial/abaxial axis http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/BSPO_0000195 but not the sides defined by that axis
lower side
view of the side of the part oriented away from the central axis of a plant (abaxial)
In plants, use this term rather than "ventral". For types of plants or fungi having horizontal parts and lacking a clear central axis, this is the surface towards the ground.
BSPO has adaxial/abaxial axis http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/BSPO_0000195 but not the sides defined by that axis
apical side
view of the side of the part oriented towards the end of the axis away from its attachment point (the apex)
basal side
view of the side of the part oriented towards the attachment point of the axis
oral side
view of the side of the organism oriented towards the oral opening
aboral side
view of the side of the organism oriented away from the oral opening
